synopsis: When a student boarding in his house is found strangled in the basement, a quiet math teacher finds himself weighing the odds of a murder conviction.

title: Valparaiso
synopsis: When an idealistic member of European Parliament investigates an oil spill, she discovers her fathers involvement and sets in motion shocking events.

title: Mortel Été
synopsis: Desperate for change, a married woman makes arrangements to escape to Chile with her lover, until a shocking turn of events changes everything.

title: Sowing the Seeds of Love
synopsis: A strong-willed woman hires a man from Mali to work on her farm (and pretend to be her boyfriend) in order to get her live-in mother off of her back.

title: Gad Elmaleh : Sans Tambour
synopsis: In a streamlined one-man show, comedian Gad Elmaleh reflects on fame, the differences between religions, the quirks of the French language and more.

title: Voisins Voisines
synopsis: Under the gun and experiencing serious writers block, a young rapper begins interfering in the personal lives of his neighbors for inspiration.

title: The Frozen Dead
synopsis: A grisly find atop a mountain in the French Pyrenees leads investigator Martin Servaz into a twisted dance with a serial killer in this icy thriller.

title: Sunny et léléphant
synopsis: In Thailand, an aspiring mahout must help a domesticated elephant readapt to the wild, and convince his master to teach him his ancestors secrets.

title: Local Color
synopsis: A widow who lost contact with her daughter 15 years earlier must care for her mixed-race grandson, who teaches her about love, racism and acceptance.

title: Foresti Party
synopsis: Comedian Florence Foresti supersizes her act in an arena show packed with sketches, celebrity impressions, epic dance routines and special guests.

title: Max and Lenny
synopsis: Two young women, a hip-hop-loving teen and a Congolese immigrant, meet and forge a bond as they explore the secrets of their Marseille neighborhood.

title: Station Horizon
synopsis: Ex-con Joris returns to his Swiss hometown, a community obsessed with American culture and ideals, to start over and save his familys gas station.

title: Belinda et moi
synopsis: A heartbroken elderly woman is excited to meet her late best friends nephew -- and then confused when she learns the beloved relative is transgender.

title: Terra
synopsis: This visually arresting documentary essay reflects on our relationship to other living creatures as humanity becomes more isolated from nature.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Nouvelle adresse
synopsis: After learning her cancer has returned, journalist and single mom Nathalie Lapointe struggles to tell her family the news and prepare for the future.

title: En cas de malheur
synopsis: After her bold jewelry heist goes awry, Lucie desperately seeks help from famous lawyer Viviane, who harbors ulterior motives for taking her case.

title: Le Clan
synopsis: A former criminal on witness protection adopts a new identity and rebuilds his life, which soon unravels when old accomplices return to settle scores.

title: Rose and the Captain
synopsis: As World War II rages in Europe, a woman living on the French colonial isle of Martinique finds herself in a position to spy on a German officer.

title: La boule noire
synopsis: In a small French town in 1979, a supermarket manager barred from joining an exclusive club becomes obsessed with finding out who voted against him.

title: Sparring
synopsis: A middle-aged boxer with a mixed record becomes a champions sparring partner while dreaming of one last chance to end his career with a victory.

title: The Climb
synopsis: A young Senegalese-French man from humble roots sets out to climb Mount Everest to impress the woman he loves -- and slowly becomes a media sensation.

title: La théorie du K.O.
synopsis: While two children and an unruly father keep him on his toes, a widower finds solace in friendship and purpose in the wrestling ring.

title: SamSam
synopsis: With the help of his flying saucer, magic cape and space ray, pint-sized superhero SamSam fights monsters and other bad guys.

title: Vertige
synopsis: Waking from a coma, a young woman pieces together the truth behind her suspicious fall from a roof as different versions of the story emerge.

title: Les Hommes viennent de Mars, les femmes de Vénus
synopsis: Paul Dewandre adapts best-selling author John Grays Men Are from Mars, Women Are from Venus book about the sexes into an illuminating one-man show.

title: Incorruptible
synopsis: In the streets of Senegal, a youth movement rises up against a regime bent on retaining power in this chronicle of the nations stormy 2012 elections.

title: Chefs
synopsis: Placed by his probation officer in the kitchen of a famous chef, an ex-convict learns the ropes and reveals a talent for cooking under pressure.

title: Gaspard Proust tapine
synopsis: With droll, self-deprecating irreverence, stand-up comic Gaspard Proust ponders the topics of the day, from the European Union to ecology.

title: Jeff Panacloc Perd Le Contrôle!
synopsis: Ventriloquist Jeff Panacloc and his foul-mouthed monkey sidekick, Jean-Marc, compete for the spotlight in this off-the-wall special filmed in Nantes.

title: Muriel Robin: Robin Revient
synopsis: In a funny and poignant one-woman show, Muriel Robin reflects on her childhood, the ups and downs of her career and her long absence from the stage.

title: Les Hommes viennent de Mars, les femmes de Vénus 2
synopsis: In his one-man show, comedian Paul Dewandre offers droll updates on the state of modern relationships, with special emphasis on parenting and aging.

title: Coluche - Quand Je Serai Grand Je Serai Con
synopsis: Rediscover the irreverent wit and comic range of French legend Coluche in this collection of sketches and songs from across his career.

title: Alex Lutz, le spectacle
synopsis: Comedian Alex Lutz serves up playful anecdotes, wide-ranging impressions and more in a special production of his one-man show at the Bobino in Paris.

title: Thomas Ngijol - 2
synopsis: After his success in film and television, comedian Thomas Ngijol returns to his roots with this one-man show full of hilarious observations on life.

title: Michel Boujenah: Enfin libre!
synopsis: Comic Michel Boujenah takes stock of his long career and, through the eyes of two of characters, discusses such topics as love, lying and beauty.

title: Kamel le Magicien: En live!
synopsis: Kamel Boutayeb performs his amazing feats of street magic and illusion with a large dose of stand-up in a live performance in Paris.

title: The Jack King Affair
synopsis: This documentary explores a bold World War II operation in which an MI5 agent infiltrated a fascist network to intercept stolen documents.

title: Le train dHitler - La bête dacier
synopsis: Trace the history of Hitlers armored private train, a 15-car mobile headquarters boasting state-of-the-art communications and anti-aircraft cannons.

title: Virginie Hocq - Cest tout moi
synopsis: In her one-woman show, comedienne Virginie Hocq uses personal stories and an array of character sketches to reflect on the vagaries of modern life.

title: Dany Boon: Des Hauts De France
synopsis: In an eclectic one-man show, French superstar Dany Boon reflects on his homeland, his first comedy gig and the challenges of parenting hostile teens.

title: Fary Is the New Black
synopsis: Armed with sly wit, a fresh outlook and plenty of style, French comedy star Fary veers from dating to stereotypes and beyond in this exclusive special.

title: Virginie Hocq - Pas dinquiétude…
synopsis: In this stand-up comedy performance, Hocq plays a host of wacky characters, including a hospital clown, a plastic surgery addict and chatty girl Nina.

title: Seven and Me
synopsis: A little girl discovers she’s the modern-day descendant of Snow White when seven dwarves arrive at her suburban home to serve as her guardian angels.

title: Robin
synopsis: A young parkour enthusiast who babysits for a living tests his own limits and becomes the neighborhoods masked vigilante.

title: Louis, Matthieu, Joseph and Anna Chedid: Concert at Palais Garnier
synopsis: Acclaimed singer-songwriter Louis Chedid teams up with his sons and daughter for a memorable stop on their 2015 tour, filmed lived in Paris.

title: Mathieu Madénian au Palace
synopsis: Under the withering comic gaze of Mathieu Madénian, no one is spared: not the pope, not Hugo Boss, not Ikea, and not even his own ex and grandmother.

title: Jean-Luc Lemoine - si vous avez manqué le début
synopsis: French comedian and TV presenter Jean-Luc Lemoine brings out the absurd in the mundane in a one-man show replete with sketches and visual aids.

title: Goldman Sachs: The Bank That Runs the World
synopsis: This documentary is a case study of the multinational tentacles of the worlds biggest bank, how it started and what its power means to everyone.

title: Putins Hidden Treasure
synopsis: This film contends that Vladimir Putin has used political maneuvers and iron-fisted henchmen to secure his power and increase his vast fortune.

title: Ahmed Sylla - Avec un grand A
synopsis: French comedian Ahmed Sylla takes the stage for a stand-up show full of self-mockery, improvisation and subtle sophistication.

title: Le nouveau protocole
synopsis: When his son dies under suspicious circumstances, a lumberjack sets out to find the truth and uncovers clues pointing to a pharmaceutical conspiracy.

title: Elles étaient en guerre (1914-1918)
synopsis: Trace the overlapping journeys of exceptional women swept up in World War I and hear their tales of bravery on historys front lines.

title: Elles étaient en guerre 1939-1945
synopsis: Mothers, nurses, soldiers and deportees -- these women fought against persecution for freedom and survival amid the turbulence of World War II.

title: Dog of War
synopsis: A young French officer of Algerian descent finds re-entry into civilian life difficult in the wake of active service in Afghanistan.

title: The Minimighty Kids
synopsis: Some have big feet or a sniffly nose, others are clumsy or too sweaty -- but these kids soon discover their mini problems can become superpowers.

title: Global Waste: The Scandal of Food Waste
synopsis: Food waste pervades modern society in countries around the globe. This documentary visits key locales to show the problem and a few solutions.

title: The Chalet
synopsis: Friends gathered at a remote chalet in the French Alps for a summer getaway are caught in a deadly trap as a dark secret from the past comes to light.

title: Kanak
synopsis: Torn between loyalty to his island home and the opportunity to play overseas, soccer phenom Christian Karembeu searches for his identity.

title: Concrete Football
synopsis: The development of professional soccer worldwide owes a great debt to the soccer -- or football -- that is played on the streets of France.

title: Soley
synopsis: Two young Haitian boxers train with everything theyve got, hoping that their talent and dedication will help them escape poverty.

title: Dictator: One Crazy Job
synopsis: How dictators acquire, abuse and thrive on power is the focus of this documentary showing similar obsessions among Hitler, Idi Amin and others.

title: Diplomacy
synopsis: When a doomed Hitler orders Paris destroyed before withdrawal, a Swedish diplomat attempts to convince a German general not to execute the plan.

title: Boris
synopsis: Playful teddy bear Boris loves his toys very much. He brings them to life using strong feelings and a big imagination.

title: 2 Alone in Paris
synopsis: A bumbling Paris policeman is doggedly determined to capture the master thief that repeatedly eludes him, even when theyre the last two men on Earth.

title: November 13: Attack on Paris
synopsis: Survivors and first responders share personal stories of anguish, kindness and bravery that unfolded amid the Paris terror attacks of Nov. 13, 2015.

title: Titeuf
synopsis: The boy with a knack for getting himself and his best pal Manu into all sorts of trouble lands his own animated television series.

title: Fanfan la Tulipe
synopsis: To avoid a forced betrothal, a hotheaded 18th century seducer joins the kings army, where he finds love and glory, according to a fake prophesy.

title: A mighty Team
synopsis: When a fit of anger leads to a serious injury, a sidelined soccer star returns to his hometown and reluctantly agrees to train the local youth.
countries: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Elles ont toutes une histoire
synopsis: From Asia, Africa and Latin America, five women share extraordinary stories of strength and determination in the face of violence and inequality.

title: Blanche Gardin: I talk to myself
synopsis: Touching on bulimia, death and cat sodomy, this French actress and comedian is keen to push the envelope in a one-woman show with understated flair.

title: Stroke of Luck
synopsis: When struggling single mother and widow Claire receives an offer of help from a retired couple, she gladly accepts, never suspecting anything ominous.

title: Trio
synopsis: Three friends who meet at a mountain retreat embark on various adventures, from treasure hunting to busting vicious hackers.

title: Gad Gone Wild
synopsis: French comic Gad Elmaleh regales a Montreal crowd with tales of awkward mix-ups and baffling customs hes encountered since moving to the U.S.

title: Metronome
synopsis: This series inspired by Lorànt Deutschs best-selling book tours Pariss colorful past, with each Metro stop representing a pivotal moment in history.

title: Chefs Table: France
synopsis: Sample the bold new flavors of France with chefs who are pushing the boundaries of fine dining and reinventing a rich culinary tradition.

South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Planet FIFA
synopsis: In the wake of an international scandal, this film scrutinizes how world soccer organization FIFA became a bloated and corrupt money-making machine.
countries: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Shark Patrol
synopsis: Renowned diver, director and cinematographer Christian Pétron examines the world of sharks in this award-winning documentary.

title: The Perfect Day
synopsis: French soccer fans, celebrities and athletes retrace the exhilarating events of July 12, 1998, as France earned a historic win in the World Cup final.

title: À Pleines Dents! (Schlemmen mit Gérard Depardieu)
synopsis: With joie de vivre, actor Gérard Depardieu takes viewers on a quest through Tuscany, Bavaria and beyond to discover the finest in local cuisines.

title: Wakufu
synopsis: Based on the online adventure game, this animated series follows 12-year-old Yugo, who employs mystical powers in his search for his real family.

title: Einsatzgruppen: The Nazi Death Squads
synopsis: This documentary series examines the Einsatzgruppen, Nazis responsible for the mass murder of Jews, Gypsies and Soviet prisoners in Eastern Europe.

title: Cannabis
synopsis: When a huge marijuana shipment falls prey to thieves, the aftermath touches players from all ranks of the drug trade between Morocco and Europe.

title: Anne Roumanoff - Aimons-Nous Les Uns Et Les Autres
synopsis: Comedian Anne Roumanoff serves up sketches on American tourists, bureaucratic nightmares, right-wing politicians, erotic misadventures and more.

title: Canteloup NArrete Jamais
synopsis: Master impressionist Nicolas Canteloup brings to life a colorful roster of celebrities, athletes and politicians in a dynamic one-man show.

title: Rire Et Chatiment
synopsis: An egocentric osteopath cant live without his practical jokes -- until his wife gets fed up and someone dies laughing. Time for introspection.

title: Claudia Tagbo Crazy
synopsis: In a one-woman show packed with music, wit and boundless energy, French-Ivorian comedian Claudia Tagbo riffs on her youth, mens lies and much more.

title: Franck Dubosc - A LEtat Sauvage
synopsis: By turns playful and sharp, comedian Franck Dubosc reflects on the call of the wild, his many gripes with the world and the challenges of fatherhood.

title: Fast Life
synopsis: A one-time Olympic medalist addicted to the limelight sets out to make a comeback, but he soon finds his life and career spiraling out of control.

title: Gad Elmaleh: Decalage
synopsis: In his debut one-man show, comedian Gad Elmaleh retraces his journey from Morocco to Quebec to Paris through a series of colorful character sketches.

title: Jérôme Commandeur se fait discret
synopsis: Actor-comedian Jérôme Commandeur plows through an ever-changing roster of characters in this rollicking one-man show filmed live in Paris.

title: Ary Abittan - À la folie
synopsis: Comic Ary Abittan performs a stand-up routine featuring an array of oddball characters sharing their passions, fears, wisdom, music and recipes.

title: Gad Elmaleh : Papa Est En Haut Spectacle 2010
synopsis: Armed with a piano, a guitar and his trademark playful wit, Gad Elmaleh riffs on fatherhood and more in a packed show at Palais des Sports in Paris.

title: Chris Esquerre muté aux Bouffes Parisiens
synopsis: Aided by charts and graphs, droll comic Chris Esquerre shares his many wacky theories about life and his absurdly impractical advice on how to cope.
